html.body: 1) Determine the Accuracy of slicing software by: A)weighing completed prints, taking into account any waste that occurs (from skirts to supports, and cutoffs), B) juding the time taken to print vs estimated time to print, and determining if there is a global average between all models in % of how off the measurement is, C) measure the same print with different settings or software to see the differences.

search.query: index=printing sourcetype="crealityGCODE" | rex field=source "(?<file>[^(\/|\')]+\.gcode)" | rex mode=sed field=plaLength "s/m//g" | rex mode=sed field=plaMass "s/g//g" | stats values(plaLength) as plaLength values(plaMass) as plaMass by file | lookup printlist.csv file OUTPUT finishedPrints | where finishedPrints>0 | eval printedLength=round(plaLength*finishedPrints,2), printedMass=round(plaMass*finishedPrints,2) | fields file finishedPrints plaLength printedLength plaMass printedMass

index=printing sourcetype=crealityGCODE | rex "\;Print time\: (?<estimatedPrintTime>.*)" | rex field=estimatedPrintTime "(?<hours>\d+) (hour|hours)" | rex field=estimatedPrintTime "(?<minutes>\d+) (minute|minutes)" | eval hours=if(match(hours,"(?<!\S)\d(?!\S)"),"0".hours,hours), minutes=if(match(minutes,"(?<!\S)\d(?!\S)"),"0".minutes,minutes) | fillnull value="00" hours,minutes | eval ept=hours.":".minutes | table _time file ept plaLength plaMass layer walls fill tempTool tempBed
